item.title: Vue App Quick Start
item.description: First Vue Project created by vue-cli init, with webpack $ vue init webpack my-p0 A newer version of vue-cli is available. latest: 2.9.6 installed: 2.8.2 ? Project name my-p0 ? Project description My first vue project created by vue-init ? Author Jason Zou <jzou2000@gmail.com> ? Vue build standalone ? Install vue-router? Yes ? Use ESLint to lint your code? Yes ? Pick an ESLint preset Standard ? Set up unit tests Yes ?
